subject: Re: [junit] Re: Running JUnit tests from a separate Java application
msgSnippet: Sorry, could have given more information. Result run = core.run(Request.method(Try.class, actionWord)); if (run.wasSuccessful()) return success! ; if
messageBody:
Sorry, could have given more information.

Result run = core.run(Request.method(Try.class, actionWord));
if (run.wasSuccessful())
return "success!";
if (run.getFailures().getException() instanceof NoTestsRemainException)
return "No such method!";
else
return "Failed for another reason!";
